MongoDB -- NYC, Palo Alto, OR Remote | Lead Technical Writer | Full-Time | Base + Pre-IPO Stock Options

We're growing our industry leading documentation team (https://docs.mongodb.com/). Our Writers are Engineers. They're hands-on with source code, write their own code examples or sample applications, test documents, and develop and maintain their own build system. Candidates should have experience with one or more of the following: RDBMS or NoSQL databases, distributed systems, networking, or programming.

Any interest? Please reach out to me at Matt.Leva@MongoDB.com, or apply directly at http://grnh.se/e2yopw1.
